name: Pole Training
description: You are trained in the use of the acrobat's pole, a special weapon type. When you use an action to attack while wielding a pole, you may either make one attack against a foe within the pole's reach or two attacks against adjacent foes.

improvements.name: Vault
improvements.description:
Once per turn, you may choose one:

  • Your jump distance is doubled for your next jump this turn.

  • The height of vertical surface you can run up is doubled this turn.

In either case, the increase does not cost you additional movement.

improvements.name: Spin Attack
improvements.description: When wielding a pole, you may spend 2 MP and spend an action to attack all adjacent foes with a spinning attack.

improvements.name: Ground Spin
improvements.description: When you use the Spin Attack ability, you may spend 1 additional MP to roll Dexterity vs Dexterity against each foe you hit, knocking prone each foe that loses their roll.
